localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Aura is a safe, simple online solution that helps people deal with end-of-life confidently. It allows you to record and share key information on how you'd like to go, leave important practical information to loved ones and celebrate your life story.
nodes.title: Aura Life - A platform that lets you prepare for death & celebrate life
nodes.author: Paul Jameson

nodes.excerpt: Everlaunch is a fun new way to start and build a business. With gamification and microlearning strategies at its core, Everlaunch's online platform allows you to take small steps toward building your business while you learn valuable skills.
nodes.title: Everlaunch - Step-by-step tool helping entrepreneurs dream, build, launch
nodes.author: Michelle Heng

nodes.excerpt: Grow and measure your community across any platform with Orbit. Use our integrations, API, or Zapier to pull in all your community data for a single view of the community, with reports, alerts, and actions, so you can build relationships, not spreadsheets.
nodes.title: Orbit - Mission control for your community
nodes.author: Li Jin

nodes.excerpt: Minimal Avatars is a unique design library for creating minimal avatars. It's fully customizable, with built-in design elements and beautifully designed color palettes. Download your avatars as SVG and further edit them in your favorite design software.
nodes.title: Minimal Avatars - Create minimal, unique and playful avatars for free
nodes.author: Jai Singh Tomar

nodes.excerpt: Jitter Plugin lets you import your Figma designs in 1 click and animate them easily. It's great to: - Animate pixel-perfect communication material (social posts, product videos, YT intros, IG storiesâ€¦) - Make quick & convincing UI demos (apps, websitesâ€¦)
nodes.title: Jitter - Animate your Figma designs in Jitter, easily
nodes.author: SÃ©bastien Robaszkiewicz

nodes.excerpt: 1. SELECT AN IMAGE, IMAGES WITH A FACE, WHITE OR LIGHT BACKGROUNDS AND GOOD CONTRAST WORK BETTER. 2. PLAY WITH THE CONTROLS. 3. DOWNLOAD. MORE INFORMATION AND SOURCE AVAILABLE ON GITHUB. CREATED BY JAVIERBYTE. BUY THE NFT.
nodes.title: PINTR - Tool that turns your images into plotter-like line drawings
nodes.author: Espen Kulia

nodes.excerpt: Given the impact the Sun â˜€ï¸ has on all our lives, a tool to predict its availability is surprisingly missing â€“ Shadowmap is here to change that. It visualizes sunlight and solar shadows based on 3D data in a worldwide interactive maps app.
nodes.title: Shadowmap - Interactive 3D maps app to visualize solar shadows worldwide
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz â›„ï¸

nodes.excerpt: Load-test.io is your very simple tool to make sure your website will never go down facing huge load traffic. Throw up to 100,000 requests per second ğŸš€ Launch offer is only $19 a month for early adopters !
nodes.title: Load-test.io - Website load testing made easy
nodes.author: Nicolas Mercier

nodes.excerpt: Nototo is a spatial workspace designed to leverage your spatial awareness by allowing you to organize all of your(or your team's) information, on a single canvas. Join our waitlist to become an early user!
nodes.title: Nototo - The spatial workspace - organize everything on one canvas
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: daily.dev is an all-in-one developer news reader that can help you stay updated on your favorite tech news. Today we are expanding our product suite with a new web app! It's mobile-friendly, fully responsive, and can be installed as a PWA. No signup needed.
nodes.title: daily.dev - All-in-one tech news reader for developers
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Save your travel finds from anywhere on the internet to your https://mustgo.io map and enjoy it as background right on your https://window.mustgo.io.
nodes.title: mustgo.io - Your travel bookmarks as backgrounds right on your New Tab
nodes.author: Vamsi Rao

nodes.excerpt: leerly teaches Spanish with compelling, comprehensible input. Popular articles from the web are summarized and translated to beginner Spanish, which users then enjoy using a suite of built-in tools to make the reading experience fun and effective.
nodes.title: leerly - Learn Spanish with compelling, comprehensible input
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Circular Docs takes a folder of Google Docs and creates a knowledge base. Perfect for anyone using Google Docs that wants to publish collections of content to the web. New changes are published automatically so the site is always up to date.
nodes.title: Circular Docs - Create a knowledge base with your Google Drive content
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: FromNotion lets you build one-page sites on Notion, whether it's a personal website, a landing page, or something more elaborate. It's simple, responsive, and no code skills required.
nodes.title: FromNotion - Beautiful one-page sites on Notion in minutes
nodes.author: Alexey Shashkov

nodes.excerpt: Upstream redefines professional networking with products designed for organic interactions and life-changing connections. Upstream for Web allows users to join any community and attend any Upstream event from your computer.
nodes.title: Upstream for Web - The next generation professional networking platform
nodes.author: Alexander Taub

nodes.excerpt: Feedio enables product managers to centrally manage feature requests coming in from clients, and internal teams. Additionally, it allows you to make sense of what creates most value for your clients and notifies them when you ship those features.
nodes.title: Feedio - Easiest way to manage feature requests
nodes.author: Aniket Jain

nodes.excerpt: Are you tired of sharing unreadable or boring links to others? Now you don't have to. Introducing Dope.Link. A powerful, simple, all-in-one link and bio-page creation tool that puts your content in front of people to maximize engagement and sales.
nodes.title: Dope.Link - Share dope links with others
nodes.author: Bill Hinostroza

nodes.excerpt: Community List is a database of 310+ Slack, Discord and Independent Communities where you can promote your Product and find new users, with all the data you'll ever need. Save 100+ hours on manual Googling and find relevant Communities in seconds. ğŸ”¥
nodes.title: Community List - Find hundreds of communities to promote your product
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: lemstash is a curated directory of 250+ handpicked tools and guides that will help you in building and growing your startup. The guides are filtered by AARRR funnel and tools by categories so you can pick the best content specifically for your need.
nodes.title: lemstash - The best curation of 250+ tools and guides for startups
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMerÃ©

nodes.excerpt: What's daunting about self-learning is not unknown, but not knowing what's unknown. It's like fumbling in a dark room with a lighter not knowing how big it is. WarmMachine maps domain concepts in machine learning and lights the room up for self-learners.
nodes.title: WarmMachine - Your personal knowledge manager
nodes.author: Quinn Dai

nodes.excerpt: Create a vector or raster graphic for your project in no time with (almost) a single button. New images are generated on the fly and the chances of seeing exactly the same picture twice approach 0. New graphical features are added several times a week.
nodes.title: chaosMachine - One-click unique graphics generator
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: You can easily create your website in minutes just on your mobile, put all messengers to make your customers happy easy and fast contacts.
nodes.title: mssg.me - Mobile, No-code, free and simple to use website builder
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Anyone can learn faster with science-backed learning methods. Traverse.link lets you use those methods to study more effectively for new skills and qualifications. The app comes with linked notes, mindmapping, active recall and spaced repetition flashcards.
nodes.title: Traverse - Learn new skills faster with 290% better recall
nodes.author: Chris Messina
